AIProviderSettingDescription: Connect your own AI service to unlock advanced features in {{productName}}. Once added, it will be accessible to all users in AI chats.
MCPSettingDescription: This section lets you manage MCP servers for AI chats within rooms. You can enable system MCP servers or add custom ones to meet your company's needs. Once enabled, these servers will be accessible to other users for their tasks.
DisableServerDescription: If you disable this server, all active consents and authorization will be revoked. If necessary, you can enable the disabled server later.
DisableServerNote: Note: That all users all again be required to complete the consent screen
DeleteServerDescription:
Deleting this server will revoke access for all users, and its settings will be permanently erased.
 To use the server again, you will need to set it up from scratch.
DeleteProviderDescription: Deleting this provider will revoke access for all users, and its settings will be permanently erased. To use the provider again, you will need to set it up from scratch.
